evidence.text: Person A: That is a fat blunt, queen.
Person B: That's why they call me the Fat Blunt Queen. Who's got a lighter?

Person B: Me too.
Person B: I know. Someone tried to sue my client over it. We won.
Person B: Whoa, how bout you just do you, ok, chica?

Person A: I love you bitch!
Person B: I love YOU, bitch! Y'all are my fuckin' girls.
Person B: And my girls!!! I'ma give all y'all my number. Anyone ever fuck with you, I want you to call me, be like `BOOP BOOP BOOP BOOP BOOP, yo Camilla, this mother fucker fuckin' with me'. Cuz you know, I lead with love, but I will fuck a mother fucker up. And THIS one... this a real one right here.
